item.description:
Melody is having a wine tasting on Sunday,April 11th from 4-6pm. It is free to taste and socialize. PAWS
animal rescue group (based in Wakefield!) will receive 10% of the wine purchases we make!

Here is the FB event link:
http://www.facebook.c...

UPDATE! UPDATE! NEW LOCATION! SO... good news and bad news... The Traveling Vineyard has gone out of business so my party/fundraiser was cancelled! BUT... Our Glass Wine Co. on Rt. 1 in Saugus (see link above) is going to hold a tasting for us instead! And now there is no guest limit! :) We can raise even more money for PAWS!
item.name: Wine tasting fundraiser for PAWS of Wakefield
